page.title: 05Shopping in Alveston
page.content: Alveston has a butcher, hardware, clothes shop,a post office and paper shop, hairdressers, greengrocers and grocers shop. We did a survey on the shop-keepers and the shoppers.We asked the shop_keepers questions like did they think the bigger shops nearby take their trade away.Most of the shop_keepers said they did.They told us that they thought the shoppers mostly used them for odds and ends,and that it was mainly the old people who used them to do their main shop. The majority of the shoppers said they lived in Alveston but they shopped at places like Safeway and Carrefour and thought that meat,fruit and veg were not as good as the quality that they could get from the local shops.
